Package foundation.omni.netapi

package foundation.omni.netapi
Omni Layer network APIs that are common between JSON-RPC (Omni Core) and REST (OmniWallet). Includes the Omniwallet REST API and the ConsensusService API that is implemented by both OmniwalletAbstractClient and OmniCoreClient.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    foundation.omni
    OmniJ Core: Defines core Omni types like OmniValue and CurrencyID.
    foundation.omni.netapi.analytics
     
    foundation.omni.netapi.omnicore
    Omni Core-based implementation of ConsensusService.
    foundation.omni.netapi.omniwallet
    Omniwallet REST API base classes and abstract implementation of ConsensusService.

    Class
    Description
    ConsensusService
    Consensus service for light (ADAP) wallets, etc.
    OmniBalanceService
